ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Footwarming Boots Made
ygData.msgSnippet: small fine steel plate is a new (relatively) blacksmithing recipe.  Its the one that can be dyed.  You use molds that the Everhots have in Kaladim.  It is not
ygData.messageBody:
small fine steel plate is a new (relatively) blacksmithing recipe. Its the
one that can be dyed. You use molds that the Everhots have in Kaladim. It
is not the same steel plate you can buy (i.e. the helm for the rebreather).

At 11:06 AM 12/6/2000 -0600, you wrote:
>how are small fine steel plate items made, or are the just talking about
>standare small steel plate?
>
>Ghirardelli
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: "Madgrizzle" <MadGrizzle@...>
>To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, December 06, 2000 9:28 AM
>Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Footwarming Boots Made
>
>
> > Footwarming Boots
> > AC10, +5 SV Cold
> > Plate wearers, small races
> >
> > Requires small fine plate steel boots and sharkskin tubing (142pp) among
> > others. Same stats as small fine plate steel boots but with +5 sv
> > cold. Is it worth the 142pp for the tubing?
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
>
>
